socorro_links.comment_text:
11 crashes from 2 installs of Firefox 147.0a1 since MicroTaskQueue got enabled today.

Crash report: https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/d069e9f8-2768-4c74-8077-a27770251114

MOZ_CRASH Reason:
```
MOZ_RELEASE_ASSERT(JS::GetClass(hostDefinedData.get()) == &sHostDefinedDataClass)
```

Top 10 frames:
```
0  xul.dll  mozilla::RunMicroTask(JSContext*, JS::MutableHandle<mozilla::MustConsumeMicro...  xpcom/base/CycleCollectedJSContext.cpp:1025
1  xul.dll  mozilla::CycleCollectedJSContext::PerformMicroTaskCheckPoint(bool)  xpcom/base/CycleCollectedJSContext.cpp:1232
2  xul.dll  mozilla::CycleCollectedJSContext::LeaveMicroTask()  xpcom/base/CycleCollectedJSContext.h:442
2  xul.dll  mozilla::dom::CallSetup::~CallSetup()  dom/bindings/CallbackObject.cpp:490
3  xul.dll  mozilla::dom::MessageListener::ReceiveMessage(mozilla::dom::ReceiveMessageArg...  dist/include/mozilla/dom/MessageManagerBinding.h:580
3  xul.dll  mozilla::dom::JSActor::CallReceiveMessage(JSContext*, mozilla::dom::JSActorMe...  dom/ipc/jsactor/JSActor.cpp:286
4  xul.dll  mozilla::dom::JSActor::ReceiveMessage(JSContext*, mozilla::dom::JSActorMessag...  dom/ipc/jsactor/JSActor.cpp:302
4  xul.dll  mozilla::dom::JSActorManager::ReceiveRawMessage(mozilla::dom::JSActorMessageM...  dom/ipc/jsactor/JSActorManager.cpp:226
5  xul.dll  mozilla::dom::WindowGlobalChild::RecvRawMessage(mozilla::dom::JSActorMessageM...  dom/ipc/WindowGlobalChild.cpp:584
5  xul.dll  mozilla::dom::PWindowGlobalChild::OnMessageReceived(IPC::Message const&)  ipc/ipdl/PWindowGlobalChild.cpp:1918
```

stack_traces.creator: aryx.bugmail@gmx-topmail.de
